item.title: Is a Hair Transplant right for you? Take Our Quiz to Find Out! + pros & cons
item.description: Introduction So, you’re balding. Perhaps it’s too soon. Your hair feels like the empty set before an episode of Between Two Ferns. Well, luckily for you, there is a solution: hair transplants. But, there is a caveat, it does come with some risks. Is a hair transplant right for you? Read on and take the quiz to find out. What is involved in a hair transplant? Think of a hair transplant as something similar to what gardeners refer to as “striking”.
